text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Aswan Governorate | settlement_type = Governorate | image_flag = Governadorat dAswan.svg | flag_size = 120px | image_blank_emblem = Emblem Aswan Governorate.jpg | blank_emblem_size = 75px | image_map = Aswan in Egypt.svg | map_caption = Aswan Governorate on the map of Egypt | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Aswan (capital) | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | government_footnotes = | area_footnotes = Britannica Book of the Year 2014, p.589 | area_total_km2 = 62726 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1501000 | population_as_of = January 2018 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | website = | iso_code = | calling_code = | footnotes = }} Aswan Governorate is a governorate of Egypt. The capital city is also named Aswan. ==Municipal divisions== The governorate is divided into the following municipal divisions Municipal Divisions Anglicized name Native name Arabic transliteration Population (July 2017 Est.) Type Abu Simbel 7,652 Markaz Aswan 71,810 Markaz Aswan 1 152,899 Kism (fully urban) Aswan 2 168,862 Kism (fully urban) Daraw 137,245 Markaz Edfu 462,400 Markaz Kom Ombo 388,555 Markaz New Aswan 96 New City New Tushka New City Nasser City 91,927 Markaz ==Important sites== *Abu Simbel *Kalabsha *Nekheb *Nekhen ==References==
